response:
Here's your personalized 1-day Paris itinerary, perfectly tailored for 2 travelers coming from Mumbai with a comfortable budget of ‚Çπ1,00,000 per person! üá´üá∑‚ú®

---

### Day 1: Paris Icons & Indulgence

#### Morning

‚Ä¢ **Eiffel Tower Visit**
  - Start your day with Paris‚Äô most iconic landmark! Take the lift to the summit for breathtaking views.
  - Duration: 2‚Äì3 hours
  - Cost: ‚Çπ2,500 per person (summit ticket)
> Transport: From CDG airport or city hotel, take a taxi (approx. ‚Ç¨45/‚Çπ4,200, 45‚Äì60 mins), or RER B train to central Paris, then Metro Line 6 to Bir-Hakeim.
> Tip: Book tickets online in advance to skip the queues. Arrive before 9:30 am for the best crowd-free experience.

‚Ä¢ **Breakfast at Carette, Trocad√©ro** üçÆü•ê
  - Famous Parisian pastries, coffee, and a terrace with a view
  - Budget: ‚Çπ900 per person

#### Afternoon

‚Ä¢ **Lunch ‚Äì Classic French Bistro** üçΩÔ∏è
  - Enjoy duck confit, steak-frites, or vegetarian specials.
  - Budget: ‚Çπ2,000‚Äì2,500 per person
> Recommendation: Caf√© Constant or Les Cocottes near the Eiffel Tower (reserve ahead).

‚Ä¢ **Louvre Museum**
  - Home to the Mona Lisa & world-class art ‚Äì explore the best highlights.
  - Duration: 2‚Äì3 hours
  - Cost: ‚Çπ1,800 per person
> Transport: Metro Line 1 from Charles de Gaulle‚Äì√âtoile to Palais Royal-Mus√©e du Louvre (15 mins).
> Booking: Museum ticket pre-booking recommended.

‚Ä¢ **Walk through the Tuileries Gardens**
  - Beautiful Parisian gardens, sculpture, perfect for photos.
  - Duration: 30‚Äì45 minutes
  - Free entry

#### Evening

‚Ä¢ **Montmartre & Sacr√©-C≈ìur**
  - Wander the charming artist‚Äôs neighborhood, climb up to the basilica for sunset views over Paris!
  - Duration: 2‚Äì3 hours
  - Free entry, artist portraits available (~‚Çπ1,200)

> Transport: Metro Line 12 to Abbesses or taxi (~30 mins from Louvre)
> Tip: Wear comfortable shoes for cobbled streets and stairs.

‚Ä¢ **Dinner with a View ‚Äì Terrace Restaurant in Montmartre** üç∑
  - French-Italian fusion or classic French fare, open late
  - Budget: ‚Çπ2,000‚Äì3,000 per person
> Recommendation: Le Refuge des Fondus (for a quirky experience) or La Maison Rose (Instagram-famous, romantic).

‚Ä¢ **Optional: Seine River Cruise**
  - Night-time cruise past landmarks lit up, with commentary.
  - Duration: 1 hour
  - Cost: ‚Çπ1,400‚Äì1,800 per person
> Departure: Pont Neuf or Eiffel Tower. Book last cruise after dinner for magical city lights!

> **Getting Around:** Paris has an excellent Metro system (Day pass ~‚Çπ1,600). Taxis/Uber are convenient for quick transfers (budget ‚Çπ6,000‚Äì8,000 for the day total).
> **Dining:** Veg and Indian restaurants also available‚Äîadd requests for alternatives!
> **Rainy Day:** Swap Tuileries Gardens for Orangerie Museum (Monet's Water Lilies) ‚Äì ‚Çπ1,700 per person.

---

### Budget Breakdown (per person, 1 day)
- Flights (economy, return): ~‚Çπ80,000 (check on cheapoair.com for best deals)
- Transfers/local transport: ‚Çπ4,000‚Äì8,000
- Food & dining: ‚Çπ6,000‚Äì8,000
- Activities/entrance fees: ‚Çπ8,000‚Äì10,000
- Souvenirs/extras: ‚Çπ2,000+
- **Total est.: ‚Çπ1L per person**

---

### Essential Travel Tips
- Paris is best explored on foot and Metro. Buy a travel pass at any station.
- Credit cards widely accepted; keep some Euros for small caf√©s/markets.
- Pickpocketing can happen ‚Äì use a crossbody bag in crowded tourist areas.
- Language: Basic French phrases are appreciated but English is widely understood.

---

### Pre-Trip Checklist
- Check passport validity (6+ months recommended)
- Print/reserve all tickets & confirmations
- Bring comfortable shoes & a universal adapter
- Download offline Google Maps/Metro map
- Check weather and pack an umbrella or jacket

---

üí° **Travel Essentials:** Check visa requirements for France based on your nationality. Apply 2-3 weeks before departure.

---

Have an amazing whirlwind in Paris! For flights and hotel options, visit cheapoair.com. If you want to adjust the pace, swap activities, or extend your trip, just let me know!
